name: NTI Fighters 2
description:
An action/adventure game designed and created by DenisGames and IsakGames. This game revolves around you fighting robots in a manly and cool way. This game is also meant for people who are older than 18, no kids allowed. So basically you talk to people from a school called NTI which exists in real life in sweden and you try to defeat every enemy who stands in your way.

Please support us so we can make more awesome games.
